table_of_contents.title: Coding practice: multiple choice and cases
CCS examination simulation: Multiple choice questions; Outpatient cases; Inpatient cases

subtitle: review guide
title: Certified coding specialist (CCS)
subjects: Diagnosis related groups -- Study and teaching

description.value: (Publisher) Provides in-depth practice with the CPT, ICD-9-CM, and HCPCs Level II coding systems to prepare fr the CCS certification exam. Based on learning theories that provide support and strategy for taking the ccs exam, this book can be tailored to specific needs. Included are an exam overview to determine strengths and weaknesses, a targeted review of ICD-9 and CPT, multiple choice questions, and cases for practicing for the CCS exam.
